website_summaries.verdict: A cute, traditional farmhouse design with quality-looking metal hardware and a dark mahogany finish. This corner unit makes a great feature in traditional and contemporary homes alike.
pros: Features a practical center drawer for storage, and 2 cupboards, each with a sturdy shelf capable of holding up to 25 pounds
Pre-made holes in the back of the unit for easy wire management
Simple to assemble, recommended that 2 people are present
Measures in at 47.5-inches long by 19.5-inches wide  by 23.25-inches high
Supports TVs up to 55-inches and 100 pounds
cons: Some users report receiving scratched parts right from the box

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this arrives completely disassembled and takes significant time to put together. My primary gripe is the construction.....it is particle board with a fake (vinyl) veneer. No solid wood whatsoever. It is a Wal-mart grade piece of furniture. Had I known this, I would have spent another $100 and locally purchased an assembled piece that at least had a real wood veneer. It looks ok at a distance, but up close it does appear cheap. Would not do this again given the facts.
customer_reviews.author: DocT65

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my new corner TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new corner TV stand !!! Assemble was a breeze ... Every peace clearly marked & instructions easy to read. Would recommend 100% to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bickie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very happy wth our order. Box did arrived damaged and the corner of the top piece was cracked. Seller responded immediately and will send a replacement top. This is a sturdy and solid piece of furniture. Was exactly what we were looking for. Directions were easy to follow. Took about 75 min to assemble. Have a 50 inch plasma on top. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy as hell!! Box was heavy and busted, but my tv stand is perfect. I was very overwhelmed taking it out of the box and realizing that I was going to have to put it together by myself. But all in all, it took about an hour and a half to two hours and I did it by myself. Instructions were so easy! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cortnie King

customer_reviews.title: Decent piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent looking piece that serves the purpose. I took each piece out of the box before trying to assemble and my last piece was damaged. Unfortunately it was the top, front corner, but when I called the company they were great about getting me a new piece sent out. Of course it did take a while so I’m the meantime I had a pile of pieces just sitting in the floor. I noticed one other damaged piece when I finally put it together, but it was not one that shows. Overall, it’s good storage for our kids playroom. It doesn’t fit our corner like I thought it would, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Perfect size. Heavy wood construction. Only draw back...many hours to put together. This is even though he is very handy and we have done many projects together like this before. The result was worth it, though. Gave it as a Christmas gift to our daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: leconnel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stand. If looks great and fits perfectly in the corner. My only issue is it's very complicated to put together, and I had to hire someone to assemble it ( adding to the cost of the stand).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: could be better. A couple pieces had some minor chips and ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds a 55" tv no problem. The assembly directions are ok, could be better. A couple pieces had some minor chips and damage, but were in spots that minimized their being noticed. The shipping box had no damage, so that tells me the pieces were damaged before being packed.
customer_reviews.author: Raycvs

customer_reviews.title: If you read a bad review- it’s true
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews , Do Not Order this product... Parts are not complete- labeling sucks so bad! I tried stopping the order , was told it was “ ready to ship”! Seriously , not even 8 hrs! Now I know why... Wish I would’ve denied this from UPS!...
customer_reviews.author: tpeebs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Corner TV Stand- Have Patience With Assembly ;)
customer_reviews.text: This piece looks great in our Apartment but it is very difficult to put together. It uses the cam-lock system and if you have ever put anything together with those then you will know why it’s a total pain to mess with Lol! We do love the tv stand tho!
customer_reviews.author: daniellec

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold our new 55" tv. It was easy to assemble and looks great. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita L. Gunning

customer_reviews.title: You can not use electric screwdriver to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Required over an hour and a half to put together but it came out beautifully. Very sturdy for 55inch tv in small room with corner. It was well worth the money. It holds 55 inch flat screen with 2 inches to spare on each side. I think a 60 inch flat screen would fit with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bargaingirl2017

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a corner stand
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, but nothing great. front molding was broken but call and they replaced right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jerimira

customer_reviews.title: Damaged but nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Came scratched and chipped but included a stain marker to hide blemishes. Box was all tore up from the shipping. Package weighs 100 pounds, I kid you not. Its so heavy. Instructions were clear and accurate on how to put together. Pictures posted.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: This is a great TV stand for my 50 inch tv
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV stand for my 50 inch tv. The accent piece came smashed but the company was great about sending me a new piece. There isn't a ton of room on the shelves with our set up. We have a large surround sound on the bottom shelf and a wii and blu ray on the top and it's kind of a tight squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Ostens70

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality corner tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality piece of furniture. Beautiful gray color. Lots of storage space and adjustable shelving. Did take 3 hours to assemble. Definitely have to read and re-read the directions. All parts fit together perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shawn a wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware-Brand New items are shipping Damaged & missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: This item should have been brand new, the outer box was not damaged, but the components inside were missing hardware, had scratches and actual chunks of wood were present in a few places. This is not cool, if a customer wanted an open box item, they would order it that way. Buyer beware is this Brand
customer_reviews.author: chefpryan

customer_reviews.title: Great tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. I get a ton of compliments on it. Our living room is odd because of a large doorway and radiators making the corner the only good place for the tv. The stand was easy to put together, took about 2 1/2 hours, has plenty of storage for out movies and other adds and ends. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Just barely fits a 55” tv
customer_reviews.text: Just barely fits a 55” tv(if your base sits on end of tv). If it gets a bumped, tv would slip off side edge of stand. Took so much effort to put together, couldn’t contemplate trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pdub

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price!! My husband assembled this in a little over two hours. Instructions were easy to follow, and extra parts were included---just in case! I would recommend this piece. Looks nice in the corner of my living room!
customer_reviews.author: L. Nussman

customer_reviews.title: Good for kindling
customer_reviews.text: This was a total disappointment. The drawer fell apart about 2 months after getting it. The door handles fell off. We ended up burning it in a bonfire. Good for kindling. I would give it less stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed by the number of chipped pieces found while pulling ...
customer_reviews.text: slightly disappointed by the number of chipped pieces found while pulling item out of the box. But overall I love the tv stand goes perfect with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is perfect for beach styled decor. It looks like driftwood (only not beat up), and is super heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv stand! Fit perfectly and was easy to assemble... looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this because of the reviews that stated it was difficult to assemble. It was so easy for me to assemble. I did it alone with only a screw driver & hammer. I liked the instructions were in picture form instead of written. It is strong and well made. It really is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jennette

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy for great price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a few months, but so far it's great. It looks nice and wasn't hard to put together. Happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful piece of furniture. I get many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The corner stand is very nice and looks great. Unfortunate the product was damaged in three areas. Poor packaging.

customer_reviews.title: Return immediately if damaged! Dont be like me!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build but multiple pieces came damaged.... we waited to long to return or else we would have

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult assembling but it looks nice and it fits perfectly in my master bedroom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and within budget
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took a while, but it’s a beautiful stand as pictured. It doesn’t collect much dust so it’s easy to clean. The tv stand fit perfectly in the corner wall and was under bugdet. It also arrived quickly.

customer_reviews.title: ... when we bought a bigger tv and it's so nice and stylish
customer_reviews.text: We bought this entertainment center when we bought a bigger tv and it's so nice and stylish.

customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful piece and exactly what I needed. I am very satisfied with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was not easy but being meticulous as I am, I payed all the parts and followed the instructions which was essential. Other than that, it’s a fine piece of furniture.

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner unit
customer_reviews.text: There was quite a bit of assembly. But it was easy. Some parts are heavy. You may need a second person if you are an old geeser like. Me.

customer_reviews.title: Great tv cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It really solved a tv mounting problem. we love it

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. If I didn’t have it already put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive but ONE handle and some of the parts (screws) were missing. As much as I PAID for this everything should be here. Very disappointed. If I didn’t have it already put together after having to go buy the parts I would definitely send this back!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing! Looks better than my tv stand I bought ...

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and solid construction. Only issue is it is hard to vacuum under because of leg support.

customer_reviews.title: Great gray tv coner stand.
customer_reviews.text: Gray finish looks high-end, not hard to assemble. Beyond my expectation. My TV is 49', almost same width with the stand.

customer_reviews.title: Corner TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Really well constructed. Fits perfect in the corner.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pieces

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for was true for this ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for was true for this piece. The instructions were difficult and several pieces arrived damaged.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture addition to our living room
customer_reviews.text: We needed something that fit a corner well, but that was on trend with our living room design. This looks perfect in the corner below our TV, but it did take more time that expected to assemble. It's heavy and sturdy as well!

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting at all. The pieces had scratches on them already, and the material the product was made of appears very cheap. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good in the living room

customer_reviews.text: Packing was perfect. Nice addition to the den. Will buy from the supplier and recommend to my friends and family

product_meta.title: South Shore Noble Corner Stand-Fits TVs Up to 55'' Wide-Gray Maple
product_meta.description: Color:Gray MapleFind the perfect corner for your TV with its timeless look, The noble collection will welcome you into your comfort zone thanks to its judicious mix of a warm and rich finish, decorative moldings and metal handles. Its perfect combination of stylish bun-feet and 2 types of refined metal handles create a timeless allure. The corner TV stand hides multiple storage spaces that can accommodate electronic equipment, DVD, CDs, books and more. And with its diagonal back lines, you’ll find the perfect corner for your flat screen TV. Store everything that goes with your TV This beautiful TV stand can house all of your electronics and media in one lovely place, with two storage cabinets, two shelves, and one drawer. Behind each door are two storage spaces separated by one adjustable 10” wide by 8” deep shelf, which can support up to 25 lb. The two open storage spaces separated between the doors are separated by one adjustable shelf, 22. 5” wide by 18” deep, which can also support up to 25 lb - and a hole in the back for wire management makes these perfect for electronic devices. Finally, the drawer below These shelves rests on metal drawer slides, measuring just over 13. 5” deep, 5. 5” tall and 20. 5” wide. All in all, there’s plenty of storage for all YOUR media. 5-Year limited shop with confidence knowing that We proudly stand behind this Noble corner TV stand with a full 5-year limited . Assembly is required. Shipped in a box measuring 85-inch by 20-1/2-inch by 4-3/4-inch and weighing 90 pounds. We recommend 2 people to assemble. Can support a total weight of up to 100 lbs. Meets or exceeds all North American safety standards. Packaging tested and certified to reduce the risk of damage during shipment. Made in North America with non-toxic laminated particleboard. South Shore furniture support team is available 7 days a week if you have any questions. Classic lines, harmonious and distinguished decor - that's what the noble collection from South Shore is all about.
feature_bullets: Spacious storage: Plenty of handy storage onboard with two cabinets with adjustable shelves, an open storage area with another adjustable shelf, and a center drawer. You’ll have room for your media and electronics.

Refined details: The two styles of metal drawer pulls and charming bun-feet add a timeless allure to this corner TV stand. Its Classic lines and deep coloring Anchor any room and will look great even after years of use.
Mix and match with other noble collection pieces: pairs nicely with the noble Armoire and dressers for a complete early American look.
: manufactured in North American with non-toxic laminated particleboard.
5-Year limited : shop with confidence knowing that We proudly stand behind this corner TV stand with a full 5-year limited . Assembly is required.
